# Battle of White Hall__disambig_1

| place       = Near White Hall, Wayne County, North Carolina
| result      = Draw
| combatant1  =  United States (Union)
| combatant2  =  CSA (Confederacy)
| commander1  = John G. Foster  Jeptha Garrard
| commander2  = Beverly Robertson
| units1      = 3rd New York Cavalry  23rd New York Independent Battery  Amory's Brigade  Stevenson's Brigade46th Massachusetts Infantry Regiment
| units2      = Robertson's Brigade
| strength1   = 11,000 (total)
| strength2   = 1,500 (total)
| casualties3 = 150
}}
